desc:
Active: Mend - Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative buffs from the caster.

Passive: Guardian Aura - Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.
notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
attrib:
+ 55 Movement Speed
+ 250 Mana
+ 5 All Attributes
+ 5 Armor
AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4
AURA ARMOR: 2
AURA BOOST HEALTH REGEN: 15
AURA BOOST ARMOR: 15
AURA BOOST THRESHOLD: 20%
MEND HEAL: 250
MEND MANA RESTORE: 160
AURA/MEND RADIUS: 900
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
